-1.event_info: Initial trigger for the ResourceMiner workflow branch.

-2.event_info: Initial trigger for the AdjudicatorAgent resolution process.

1.event_info: Event indicating initial or updated resource availability, prompting the ResourceMiner to observe the global map state.

2.event_info: Event detailing current land ownership status, prompting decision-making on energy investment for land contestation or maintenance.

3.event_info: Event conveying the miner's chosen investment strategy to the adjudicator for outcome determination.

fields.name: miner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner making the investment.

fields.name: grid_cell_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the grid cell being contested or maintained.

fields.name: investment_amount
fields.description: Amount of energy invested by the miner.

4.event_info: Event indicating the outcome of the resolution process for contested land.

fields.name: miner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner receiving the outcome.

fields.name: grid_cell_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the contested or maintained grid cell.

fields.name: winner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner who won the contest.

fields.name: investment_amount
fields.description: Amount of energy invested by the winning miner.

fields.name: tie_resolution
fields.description: Flag indicating if the outcome was resolved due to a tie.

5.event_info: Event delivering the adjudication results based on investment competitions.

fields.name: miner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner receiving the outcome.

fields.name: grid_cell_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the contested or maintained grid cell.

fields.name: winner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner who won the contest.

fields.name: investment_amount
fields.description: Amount of energy invested by the winning miner.

fields.name: tie_resolution
fields.description: Flag indicating if the outcome was resolved due to a tie.

6.event_info: Event signaling the conclusion of the ResourceMiner's current workflow operations.

fields.name: completion_status
fields.description: Status of the workflow operation completion, e.g., success or failure.

fields.name: miner_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the ResourceMiner completing the activity.

fields.name: activities_completed
fields.description: Description of activities that were completed during the miner's operation.
